definition: sordid and contemptible (idiom); vile and repulsive (esp. character or action)

sentences.english: She demeans herself by doing his dirty work.
sentences.chinese: 她替他干卑鄙的勾当，贬低了自己的人格。

sentences.english: Elizabeth Wong, 37, said it was an insidious and underhanded attempt to smear her reputation.
sentences.chinese: 黄洁冰说，这种做法阴险卑鄙，是想破坏她的名誉。

sentences.english: It was a 11)dirty trick, but it killed old Phoebe.
sentences.chinese: 这实在是种卑鄙把戏，可差点儿把老菲比笑死。

sentences.english: He was basely slandered by his enemies.
sentences.chinese: 他受到仇敌卑鄙的诋毁。

sentences.english: Shelley never pardoned baseness of this sort.
sentences.chinese: 谢莉绝不会原谅这种卑鄙的行为。

sentences.english: Wen said if water also has smart this is despicable means.
sentences.chinese: 文若水也说曾聪明这是卑鄙的手段。

sentences.english: Three six 0, Contemptible, Knowing you and me.
sentences.chinese: 三六零，卑鄙心，心知又肚明。

sentences.english: A good name is dishonoured by unworthy conduct.
sentences.chinese: 卑鄙的行为往往损害好的名誉。

sentences.english: It's the basest of the site.
Deceitful and despicable is one descriiption that wronged wives could apply to their cheating husbands.
sentences.chinese: 欺诈和卑鄙是受害妻子描述出轨丈夫的词汇。

sentences.english: I was set down by a snide businessman.
sentences.chinese: 我上了一个卑鄙商人的当。

sentences.english: He is unprincipled, swindling the widow and her fatherless son.
sentences.chinese: 他这个人很卑鄙，期负人家孤儿寡母。

sentences.english: She was the meanest cat in old Chicago town.
sentences.chinese: 她是在芝加哥老镇卑鄙的猫。

sentences.english: Once upon a time, there lived a despicable king who was known for his despotism.
sentences.chinese: 从前，有一个卑鄙的国王，以其暴政二臭名昭著。

sentences.english: Such a mean fellow, though never so rich, should not be admitted into society.
sentences.chinese: 这样卑鄙的人，虽则有钱，也应允许他进入社交界。

sentences.english: He was not afraid of ornery rustlers.

definition: sordid and contemptible (idiom); vile and repulsive (esp. character or action)
lower course of a river/low-class/mean and lowly/vulgar/obscene
breaking faith and abandoning right (idiom); to betray/treachery/perfidy
